section.title: Saving a Query String as a Bookmark
section.para: A bookmark can be used to remember a search query, and shared with other users.

procedure.title: Saving a Query String as a Bookmark

step.para: Enter the desired search query in the search bar and perform the search.
Click the star-shaped Bookmark button to the right of the search bar to open the New Bookmark window.
Enter the Name of the bookmark.
Edit the Search string field (if applicable).
Click OK to save the query as a bookmark and close the window.
The search query is saved and displays in the Bookmarks pane.

section.para: You have saved a search query as a bookmark for future reuse. Use the Bookmark pane to find and select the bookmark.
